name: Coin Jar Jamboree
description:
Coin Jar Jamboree is a simple, relaxing game that allows players to count coins and watch them fall into the jar with a satisfying jingle. 

To play, players can press the various coin buttons to spawn coins and watch them fall into the jar below. If players want to speed things up, they can hit the "make it rain" button to randomly spawn multiple coins. 

For those who want to free the coins, there is a "smash the jar" button that allows players to scatter the coins. 

The game can be easily reset to try again, and there is no greater goal than to enjoy a satisfying break from whatever else players may be doing. 

This project may become a full fledge Penny Falls project in the future so if your interested let me know.

The game was developed by me Knight Ideas and features a music track by Lindsey Sewell - https://freesound.org/people/lindseysewell/sounds/512929/. 

Players can find more games and content on Knight Ideas' website at www.knightideas.co.uk.
